content:
Create and Modify Category Groups

Category groups are containers for individual data categories. They are used by Salesforce Knowledge (articles), answers (questions), or ideas.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience
Data categories are available in all editions with Knowledge except Professional Edition.
Salesforce Knowledge is available for an additional cost in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To view the Data Categories page: View Data Categories in Setup
To create, edit, or delete data categories: Manage Data Categories

To create a category group:
Click New in the Category Groups section.
Specify the Group Name up to 80 characters.
Optionally, modify the Group Unique Name and enter a description.

Activating Category Groups
Deactivate category groups by default. To activate:
Move the mouse pointer over the name of the category group and click Activate Category Group icon.

You can now add categories to your category group. Salesforce automatically creates a top-level category named All. Optionally, rename it.
title: Creating and Managing Category Groups in Service Cloud
